Articles.Content:
So... it's gotten to the point now where I just sit in the SPH/VAB and stare at the empty craft in front of me going: "What the hell do I build now?"

I've been to pretty much every planet and moon, and built so many things... I've just ran into a complete builder's block. This builders block is also the main reason why I've been a bit of a hiatus from KSP. Any ideas or suggestions? I might look at doing progression updates using videos and image albums, perhaps look out for me in the mission control segment soon (totally not self-advertising myself here)

Cheers~

Edited January 21, 2016 by ToTheMun

Install RO and RP-0, give Earth a chance.

Or just take a break from the game.

Forgive my ignorance mighty regex, but what is RO and RP-0?

And I have been taking a break from the game. For like, 3 months. Not much of a hiatus, but still a hiatus.

Here is what he was getting at:

RSS  http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/50471-105-real-solar-system-v1041-nov-18/

RO http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/53986-0235-realism-overhaul-rov52-modlist-for-rss-63014/

RSS (Real Solar System) will convert everything into our solar system. Kerbin will be Earth, Duna will be Mars and so on. Real distances are in effect and planet sizes. 

RO (Realism Overhaul) will change the fuels you use (more realistic) and change the engines closer to the real ones used today.
Find something that you want to do that isn't a normal thing to do. Or install mods to spice it up.

33 minutes ago, hellblazer said:

Here is what he was getting at:

RSS  http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/50471-105-real-solar-system-v1041-nov-18/

RO http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/53986-0235-realism-overhaul-rov52-modlist-for-rss-63014/

RSS (Real Solar System) will convert everything into our solar system. Kerbin will be Earth, Duna will be Mars and so on. Real distances are in effect and planet sizes. 

RO (Realism Overhaul) will change the fuels you use (more realistic) and change the engines closer to the real ones used today.

Ahh, thank you very much good sir

 

27 minutes ago, Bill Phil said:

Find something that you want to do that isn't a normal thing to do. Or install mods to spice it up.

Finding 'something to do' is easier said than done. Why else would I make my way to the forums?
I mean find something that isn't an easy thing to do. Challenges, cool ideas, making fictional ships from TV functional in KSP, etc.
Spent my day designing a (stock) craft that can dive underwater and go to orbit from there. Got one already?
